sqlMap.statement:
SELECT T.GENZ_NO, T.PARTY_ID, T.PARTY_CHN_NAME, T.CARD_TYPE, T.CARD_NO, T.CREATE_DATE, T.INFACT_DATE, T.STATUS_CD FROM T07_PARTY_GANZ T
T.GENZ_NO = #genz_no#
T.PARTY_ID = #party_id#
T.PARTY_CHN_NAME = #party_chn_name#
T.INFACT_DATE >= #create_date_disp#
T.CREATE_DATE <= #infact_date_disp#
T.STATUS_CD = #status_cd#

SELECT COUNT(T.GENZ_NO) FROM T07_PARTY_GANZ T
T.GENZ_NO = #genz_no#
T.PARTY_ID = #party_id#
T.PARTY_CHN_NAME = #party_chn_name#
T.CREATE_DATE >= #create_date_disp#
T.INFACT_DATE <= #infact_date_disp#
T.STATUS_CD = #status_cd#

INSERT INTO T07_PARTY_GANZ ( GENZ_NO, PARTY_ID, PARTY_CHN_NAME, CARD_TYPE, CARD_NO, CREATE_DATE, INFACT_DATE, STATUS_CD ) VALUES ( #genz_no#, #party_id#, #party_chn_name#, #card_type#, #card_no#, #create_date_disp#, #infact_date_disp#, #status_cd# )
